comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Dr. Finley is Dr. John H. Finley, President of the College of the City of New York. Weston is Edward Payson Weston, noted pedestrian, about to walk from NYC to Chicago. This was taken on Monday June 2, 1913. For more information about this occasion see my comment here: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3408792403/

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks lifeasdaddy.  We'll use the information you've provided to add a date, and enhance the title in this record next time we update it.
